ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Treatment of 3,4-dibromohexane with strong base leads to loss of 2 equivalents of HBr and formation of a product with formula C6H10. Three products are possible. Name each of the three, and tell how you would use 1H and 13C NMR spectroscopy to help identify them. How would you use UV spectroscopy?
